column1: The deadline to get health insurance on the exchange in New York is January 31st.  Get free enrollment assistance in your language by: ✅Calling 311 ✅Texting CoveredNYC (SeguroNYC en Español) to 877877 ✅Online at https://t.co/afrjbWRyEu

Punishing the poor does not create a safer environment. Instead it threatens the very foundation of our community. That is why my New York colleagues and I wrote a letter to @NYGovCuomo asking him to help put an end to MTA's dangerous policing policy. Check it out here: https://t.co/g1AOWHA7Lh

“It’s our job to redefine the rules of society and to treat people who give birth with the dignity they deserve.”  That’s why I’m fighting for three months of paid family leave in the United States. https://t.co/QzpKSYoF6o

I agree. This is not the time for half-measures. Half-measures threaten the fate of our planet and the future of our kids and grandchildren. The Green New Deal for Public Housing Act is not radical. Radical is keeping us on track to climate catastrophe. Let's pass this bill! https://t.co/ANmDLaoQQy

When we transform our public housing we create an economy of scale for weatherization retrofitting and renewable businesses. That economic impact ripples across the industry making energy efficiency solar and wind even more affordable and attractive for everyone else. 🌿🏗 https://t.co/QxZHYLoxb8

The issue of housing is the perfect place for us to reimagine what a progressive economic agenda can do particularly with a Green New Deal context. It means taking on the climate crisis the lack of well-paying jobs and housing conditions all at once. ✊🏽💪🏽 https://t.co/3Kg6UStASn

A Green New Deal for public housing means hundreds of thousands of jobs. 👷‍♀️👷🏽‍♂️🛠  Our bill shows that the climate crisis is not about jobs vs. the environment. We need electrical workers. We need construction workers. Retrofitting this housing creates the green jobs of the future. https://t.co/Pwyty6xazp

I am honored to introduce the Green New Deal for Public Housing Act with @SenSanders today. It is time for our government to invest in our infrastructure our people and our future.  You can read more about the legislation here: https://t.co/2FNarOa8Uu

This is why I introduced the Eradicating Poverty Act as part of my Just Society package. We haven't changed the way we calculate poverty since the 60s and millions are being left behind as a result. https://t.co/338Cjk1TUE
Proud to join @SenWarren and @RepMarkPocan in the fight to hold private equity firms responsible. We cannot continue to put profit over people. Check out more here 👇🏿 https://t.co/ODhcdgNAme

It's time to end the Hyde Amendment. Thank you @RepBarbaraLee and @RepPressley for fearlessly fighting for a future of dignity and respect. There is strength in sisterhood ✊🏻✊🏼✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿 #BeBoldEndHyde https://t.co/Dgo5mpU4mp

Bhairavi Desai an activist and the founder of the New York Taxi Workers Alliance has been fighting against this scheme.  Yesterday we heard her powerful testimony as she highlighted how taxi drivers are handcuffed to the wheel. https://t.co/iP2nPXhY4S

Taxi drivers in NYC are in crisis. They are trapped in a predatory lending scheme that steals their earnings and has led to a suicide crisis.  We must bail them out. Yesterday we held a Congressional hearing to hear from drivers and advocates for reform ⬇ https://t.co/6qSG66pdFN
I am proud to introduce #AJustSociety package today to begin the important work of building a more just and prosperous society.  You can read more about the legislation here: https://t.co/Cm7BdhFumU

More than 1 million in the tri-state region are facing flood risk today. This risk will only grow. We need to take bold action to prepare for the risks of climate change sea level rise and increased coastal storms. #OurCoastOurFuture

We are the Green New Deal generation—it’s time for us to demand change. I'm inspired by the young activists that are at the forefront of this fight.  But praise and inspiration isn’t good enough. It’s time to act. It’s time to implement a #GreenNewDeal. https://t.co/7ePUZq9AcS

Rising seas and extreme weather events are destroying our communities from Hurricane Maria in Puerto Rico to immense wildfires in California.  Kaylah a young activist from the U.S. Virgin Islands shared what those consequences look like for her home. https://t.co/1TxVGYTLod

I spent time with young climate leaders earlier this week to hear their visions for climate action to save our planet and build equity into our communities.  Here’s what they said ↓ https://t.co/qpHiU7Tqrf

Hundreds of thousands of our neighbors colleagues and friends are at risk of losing their legal status in the US.  I hope all #DACA recipients in my community and across the US keep their status up to date. Renew yours today ⬇️⬇️⬇️ https://t.co/e4fay4F9ke

While Pantaleo’s termination was necessary justice has not been served for Eric Garner and his loved ones. Until we implement major criminal justice reform our communities will continue to suffer the consequences of inaction and our brothers and sisters will continue to die.

Predatory lending schemes ruined the lives of many taxi drivers while banks credit unions and debt collectors raked in huge profits. With the help of @RepEspaillat and my New York colleagues I sent a letter to regulators asking them how this happened under their supervision. https://t.co/5JjTuBSG2h

Let’s be clear: Trump’s racism isn’t a distraction. It has a clear purpose: to dehumanize black and brown people in this country. Thanks to @jewishaction and the Jewish community for continuing to speak out against this hate. https://t.co/emxUJrMaDr

.@GileadSciences charges $2000 a month for PrEP even though it is sold for $8 in other countries. Corporate greed is costing people their lives. I joined @RepCummings  @RepPressley and @RepRoKhanna in a letter demanding answers. It’s time to #BreakThePatent. https://t.co/xElmOC9FUp
Thank you to @RepPressley and @PattyMurray for your leadership! https://t.co/gBGfFP122t
The deadline to apply for #DisasterUnemploymentAssistance in #PuertoRico for people who became unemployed due to#HurricaneMaria has b. Call 787-945-7900 to apply. For details https://t.co/K3tI2rBv1k

Se extiende la fecha límite hasta el 24 de junio para solicitar #DisasterUnemploymentAssistance en #PuertoRico para las personas que quedaron desempleadas debido a #HurricaneMaria. Llame al 787-945-7900 para aplicar. https://t.co/Dy6p30MGSA

.@RepChuyGarcia Has shown great leadership today introducing an amendment to the American Dream and Promise Act that would protect some of our most vulnerable communities from an out of control Trump administration. Thank you Congressman García for standing strong. https://t.co/tsQrmJPkK4

NY can lead in the fight to save our planet and transform our economy. The Climate and Community Protection Act sets us on that course. CCPA focuses funding and growth around frontline communities labor groups and the poor! Thank you @nydiavelazquez & NY Delegation for leading. https://t.co/Uzt99IeN67

Lampert’s actions are putting families' financial stability at risk. That’s why @SenWarren and I are joining forces with workers across the nation to take a stand against the rich and powerful to get workers the pay they've earned. https://t.co/zFhDiUmrHb

Lampert and his buddies made billions 💰 while they destroyed Sears. They enriched themselves at the expense of the workers that built Sears. Now in an effort to ever last drop of cash from the Sears workers Lampert is reneging on $42m in earned and promised severance pay.
Last week @senwarren and I sent a letter to @stevemnuchin1. This week we’re sending one to Sears CEO Eddie Lampert.  👇 https://t.co/at0TUuQE0C

Asaya Bullock has spent most of his life on the Be The Match registry. So far he has been unable to find a matching donor.  SIGN UP TO BE A MATCH: https://t.co/TZknQKxnkp MORE ON ASAYA'S STORY: https://t.co/sUypQwyzJV https://t.co/KpAtlk6hCe

You shouldn't have to run for Congress to get a stable income.  Tipped workers earn a subminimum wage creating a system that leads to poverty exploitation and sexual harassment.  I'm 'serving for an hour' Friday in my district in support of #1FairWage.

.@forrespect has empowered workers around the nation to fight for an economy that allows us to work in dignity. Meet some of the @Sears workers who @senwarren and I are supporting today: https://t.co/qTON6W4ZP0
.@SenWarren and I are joining forces to stand up to @SecretaryMnuchin and speak out for thousands of workers who lost their jobs at @Sears.  Video below  👇 https://t.co/UaqaS5iMl5

Thank you @RepCummings and @OversightDems for holding this important hearing on public investment in the only drug preventing the transmission of HIV PrEP. This drug belongs to the public. #PeopleOverProfit https://t.co/lRkYxebPR9

Thank you @RepJerryNadler. Your leadership is helping to ensure that NY remains on the front lines in the fight to protect our environment and our people. Together we will help NY create thousands of high-wage renewable energy jobs. https://t.co/DWlic2pEyk
